content: Charging port feels loose after just 2 months. Cable keeps falling out. Build quality is disappointing for this price.
UI redesign made everything worse. Old version was better. Why change what wasn't broken? Bring back the classic interface!
Camera zoom is impressive. Can capture details from far away. Video stabilization works great too. Really happy with photo quality.
Battery percentage drops 10% in minutes then stays stable for hours. The indicator is completely unreliable. Can't trust the readings.
Navigation is terrible. Back button doesn't work consistently. Sometimes it closes the app instead of going back one screen.
Low light camera performance is poor. Photos come out blurry and noisy. Night mode doesn't help much. Disappointing.
Phone gets extremely hot during charging. Battery health already dropped to 95% in 3 months. Concerned about long-term durability.
The gesture controls are confusing. Accidentally trigger actions all the time. Need better visual feedback for gestures.
Camera filters are fun and creative. Love the variety of options. Makes photography enjoyable. Great addition to the app.
UI font size is too small. Hard to read on smaller screens. No option to increase text size in settings. Accessibility issue.
